Class ViewerPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.api.rest.model.ViewerPage
  • public class ViewerPage
extends Object
    Simple template to create a json-representation of a viewer page, typically a CMS-Page. Used to provide slides to sliders
